alert.note: Alert for Malheur (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 10 at 2:50PM PDT until August 10 at 3:15PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MALHEUR COUNTY... At 349 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Vines Hill, or 24 miles west of Parma, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Vines Hill, Double Mountain and Shell Rock Butte around 350 PM MDT. Bully Creek Reservoir, Keeney Pass and Sugarloaf Butte around 410 PM MDT. Vale and Nyssa around 420 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
